description: A flint and steel is a tool used to light fires.

Pickaxes are one of the most commonly used tools in the game, being required to mine all ores, rock, rock-based blocks and metal-based blocks. They allow the player to mine blocks at faster speeds, with the speed increasing depending on the material it is made out of.
Shears are a tool used primarily to shear sheep and mine a few types of blocks.
Leads, also known as leashes, are items used to leash and lead passive mobs and utility mobs.
Compasses are an item used to point to the world spawn. They are crafted using 4 iron ingots and one piece of redstone dust.
